Texts.Chs:
肉食性的蚁人以其坚硬的甲壳和异常危险的战斗能力而闻名。其能够适应任何战斗情况。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 肉食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  HP x^green;1.15^reset;, 坠落伤害 x^green;0.4^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% 精神抗性, +^cyan;15^reset;% 物理抗性, +^cyan20^reset;% 辐射抗性
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: 疯癫
  科技: ^green;战士本能^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;:
  ^green;炎热^reset;生物群落: HP x^green;1.1^reset;
  较低的地面摩擦力

^orange;武器^reset;:
  镰刀专精: +^green;15^reset;%
  阔剑专精: +^green;15^reset;%
  斧系专精: +^green;10^reset;%
  盾: 防御 x^green;1.1^reset;
  完美格挡: 增加 ^green;盾击^reset;几率

^red;弱点^reset;:
  能量 x^red;0.8^reset;, -^red;25^reset;% 魅力
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% 火炎抗性, -^red;15^reset;% 寒气抗性
Texts.Eng:
The carnivorous Thelusians are well known for their tough chitin shell and exceptionally dangerous combat abilities. Able to adapt to suit any combat situation.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;8^reset; Defense, Fall Damage x^green;0.4^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% Mental, +^cyan;15^reset;% Physical, +^cyan;20^reset;% Radiaoactive
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Insanity
  Tech: ^green;Warrior Instincts^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  Improved ground traction

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Scythe Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%
  Broadsword Mastery: +^green;15^reset;%
  Axe Mastery: +^green;10^reset;%
  Shield: Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Perfect Block: Increases ^green;Shield Bash^reset; chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.75^reset;, -^red;25^reset;% Charisma
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;15^reset;% Ice
